content: this hat is knit in super bulky yarn for a fast and beginner friendly project with sizes for the whole family all you need to know is how to knit purl and k2tog measurements 15 x6 5 17x7 5 19 x8 5 21 x9 materials 45 57 69 81 yards super bulky yarn us 11 16 circular needles us 11 dpns 1 stitch marker
